pullrequest.title: Move brew cleanup into separate script

content.raw:
tl;dr yes it fixes brew doctor

These scripts always want mercurial installed, which now installs python as well and puts things like pip and easy_install in `/usr/local/lib/python/site-packages`. `brew remove python` doesn't get rid of the site-packages folder ([rationale here](https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/issues/4752#issuecomment-246772703)), and it gives a `brew doctor` complaint when running `test-bot` for bottle building with that folder still around. Complicated.
